trans-unit.target: 除非你操控沼泽或山脉，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}或{R}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·789 | Dragonskull Summit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Poseidon offshore oil rig became one of the Enclave's mightiest fortresses, and eventually, the site of their greatest defeat.
trans-unit.target: 英克雷将海神石油钻井平台建成了他们最强大的要塞，也在此吞下了他们最惨痛的失利。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·790 | Drowned Catacomb | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drowned Catacomb
trans-unit.target: 水没墓穴

trans-unit.resname: PIP·790 | Drowned Catacomb | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.\n{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控海岛或沼泽，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{B}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·790 | Drowned Catacomb | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Make no mistake, the rats run these tunnels. We just live here."\n—Fiends gang member
trans-unit.target: 「别搞错了，隧道是老鼠的天下。我们只是借住在这里。」 ～恶魔帮成员

trans-unit.resname: PIP·791 | Evolving Wilds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evolving Wilds
trans-unit.target: 成形野地

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·791 | Evolving Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "One day, maybe, kids will play here again."\n—Preston Garvey
trans-unit.target: 「有一天，或许孩子们会再一次在这里嬉戏。」 ～普雷斯敦·加维

trans-unit.target: 异国果园

trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为由对手操控的地能产生之任一颜色。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·792 | Exotic Orchard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Orwell Orchards is about as peaceful and pleasant as a tomb can get.
trans-unit.target: 整个奥威尔果园安静、祥和，就跟墓地没两样。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·793 | Fetid Pools | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 恶臭水塘

trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{U}或{B}。） CARDNAME须横置进战场。 循环{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: PIP·793 | Fetid Pools | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Ask any of the old-timers and they'll all agree—something ancient and terrifying haunts the sea.
trans-unit.target: 随便去问哪个旧时代的人，他们都会同意这说法～正是因为有远古惧物作祟其间，大海才永不安宁。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·794 | Glacial Fortress | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Glacial Fortress
trans-unit.target: 冰河要塞

trans-unit.resname: PIP·794 | Glacial Fortress | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控平原或海岛，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}或{U}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·794 | Glacial Fortress | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Considered the greatest battle in history, Operation: Anchorage showcased the effectiveness of the winterized T-516 power armor.
trans-unit.target: 冬季T-51b动力装甲的效果，在史上最宏大的战役～安克雷奇行动中展现得淋漓尽致。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·795 | Hinterland Harbor | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hinterland Harbor
trans-unit.target: 内陆港湾

trans-unit.resname: PIP·795 | Hinterland Harbor | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 除非你操控树林或海岛，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}或{U}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·795 | Hinterland Harbor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Radioactive fog was the least of the inhabitants' worries.
trans-unit.target: 辐射雾反倒是居民最不担心的东西。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·796 | Irrigated Farmland | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Irrigated Farmland
trans-unit.target: 漫灌农地

trans-unit.resname: PIP·796 | Irrigated Farmland | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{W}或{U}。） CARDNAME须横置进战场。 循环{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: PIP·796 | Irrigated Farmland | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Sure, there are prettier farms in the Commonwealth, but none of them know how to grow tarberries like we do."\n—Wiseman
trans-unit.target:
「联邦的确有些更漂亮的农场，但他们种塔莓的功力比不上我们。」
～智者

trans-unit.resname: PIP·797 | Isolated Chapel | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Isolated Chapel
trans-unit.target: 孤立礼拜堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·797 | Isolated Chapel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.\n{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控平原或沼泽，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}或{B}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·797 | Isolated Chapel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The pride of Calverton was now the town's only marker.
trans-unit.target: 卡尔弗顿祈祷团现在成了小镇的唯一地标。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·798 | Jungle Shrine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Jungle Shrine
trans-unit.target: 丛林祭祠

trans-unit.resname: PIP·798 | Jungle Shrine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}，{G}或{W}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·798 | Jungle Shrine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once, the "Houses of Tomorrow." Now, the tombs of today.
trans-unit.target: 过去，这里是「明日之屋」。现在，这里是今日之冢。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·799 | Memorial to Glory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Memorial to Glory
trans-unit.target: 勇行纪念碑

trans-unit.resname: PIP·799 | Memorial to Glory | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W}.\n{3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}。 {3}{W}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：派出两个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·799 | Memorial to Glory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It commemorates the Battle of Hoover Dam. The rangers lured the best of Caesar's Legion into Boulder City, then blew the whole town up.
trans-unit.target: 这块纪念胡佛大坝之战的石碑上详细记载了战斗过程：游骑兵将凯撒军团精锐悉数引入巨石城，而后将整座城镇夷为平地。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·800 | Mortuary Mire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mortuary Mire
trans-unit.target: 丧葬泥沼

trans-unit.resname: PIP·800 | Mortuary Mire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.\n{T}: Add {B}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。 {T}：加{B}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·800 | Mortuary Mire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Burying the dead. What an archaic idea.
trans-unit.target: 埋葬死者。多么过时的想法。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·801 | Mossfire Valley | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mossfire Valley
trans-unit.target: 苔炎山谷

trans-unit.resname: PIP·801 | Mossfire Valley | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PIP·801 | Mossfire Valley | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I come from a place far to the northwest. It's called The Pitt. It's ... well ... let's be honest ... a nightmare."\n—Wernher
trans-unit.target: 「我来自离西北部很远的地方，一个叫做匹兹堡的城镇。那里…呃…实话跟你说…就是个噩梦。」 ～沃纳

trans-unit.resname: PIP·802 | Myriad Landscape | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Myriad Landscape
trans-unit.target: 繁茂地境

trans-unit.resname: PIP·802 | Myriad Landscape | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {C}.\n{2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for up to two basic land cards that share a land type, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{C}。 {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你牌库中搜寻至多两张具共通地类别的基本地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·803 | Mystic Monastery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mystic Monastery
trans-unit.target: 神秘寺院

trans-unit.resname: PIP·803 | Mystic Monastery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}, {R}, or {W}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}，{R}或{W}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·803 | Mystic Monastery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hey, come see me at the Top of the World when you get a chance. I've got something for you. And, I pinky-swear I won't kill you."\n—Rose, robotic raider
trans-unit.target: 「嘿，你有机会可以来世界之巅找我，我有些东西要给你。而且，咱俩拉钩，我绝不杀你。」 ～机器人掠夺者萝丝

trans-unit.resname: PIP·804 | Nesting Grounds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nesting Grounds
trans-unit.target: 筑巢栖地

trans-unit.resname: PIP·804 | Nesting Grounds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{1}, {T}: Move a counter from target permanent you control onto another target permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {1}，{T}：将一个指示物从目标由你操控的永久物移到另一个目标永久物上。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·804 | Nesting Grounds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The ooze may look like honey, but stingwings aren't as sweet.
trans-unit.target: 这摊粘稠物或许看上去很像蜂蜜，但飞刺虫的滋味并没有那么甜美。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·805 | Nomad Outpost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nomad Outpost
trans-unit.target: 游牧人哨站

trans-unit.resname: PIP·805 | Nomad Outpost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}，{W}或{B}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·805 | Nomad Outpost | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Fort served as Caesar's base of operations. From here, the Legion dreamed of transforming themselves from nomads to an empire.
trans-unit.target: 筑城岭要塞是凯撒的行动基地。从此之后，军团便开始着手实现他们终结游民生活，建立辉煌帝国的梦想。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·806 | Opulent Palace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Opulent Palace
trans-unit.target: 奢华宫殿

trans-unit.resname: PIP·806 | Opulent Palace | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}，{G}或{U}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·806 | Opulent Palace | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Gather now, faithful followers of the most wise and beneficent Mothman. Let us light his holy beacon with the radiance of the fireflies."\n—Brother Moncrief
trans-unit.target: 「最聪明、最仁慈的天蛾人，他的忠实追随者们，集合。让我们用萤火虫的光芒点亮他神圣的指明灯吧。」 ～蒙克利夫兄弟

trans-unit.resname: PIP·807 | Path of Ancestry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Path of Ancestry
trans-unit.target: 祖灵径道

trans-unit.resname: PIP·807 | Path of Ancestry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为你指挥官标识色中的任一颜色。当该法术力用来施放与你指挥官具共通生物类别的生物咒语时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: PIP·807 | Path of Ancestry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your mother would have been so proud."
trans-unit.target: 「你母亲原本该有多骄傲。」

trans-unit.resname: PIP·808 | Prairie Stream | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prairie Stream
trans-unit.target: 沃原溪流

trans-unit.resname: PIP·808 | Prairie Stream | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{W}或{U}。） 除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·808 | Prairie Stream | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Hunting mirelurks. Selling their eggs. It's not much, but it's honest work . . . for a raider.
trans-unit.target: 猎捕泥沼蟹。收获其蛋卵来卖。虽然挣得不多，但也是份正经工作…对掠夺者而言。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·809 | Razortide Bridge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Razortide Bridge
trans-unit.target: 锐潮结桥

trans-unit.resname: PIP·809 | Razortide Bridge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nIndestructible\n{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 不灭 {T}：加{W}或{U}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·809 | Razortide Bridge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In order to join the Order of the Tadpole, one must pass an athletics test that requires participants to run along the bridge, contending with feral ghouls, bloodbugs, and the bridge's dilapidated state. Don't forget to stretch!
trans-unit.target: 若要加入蝌蚪目教会，候选人须通过田径测试，即在时限内跑过大桥，克服狂尸鬼、吸血虫及糟糕桥况等挑战。别忘了先热身！

trans-unit.resname: PIP·810 | Roadside Reliquary | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Roadside Reliquary
trans-unit.target: 路边神龛

trans-unit.resname: PIP·810 | Roadside Reliquary | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card if you control an artifact. Draw a card if you control an enchantment.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：如果你操控神器，则抓一张牌。如果你操控结界，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·810 | Roadside Reliquary | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You'd be surprised what people leave behind on the old roads. Gotta keep your eyes peeled for the good stuff.
trans-unit.target: 你看到老路上人们留下的东西一定会大吃一惊。务必睁大眼睛不要错过好玩意。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·811 | Rogue's Passage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rogue's Passage
trans-unit.target: 浪客小径

trans-unit.resname: PIP·811 | Rogue's Passage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {4}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·811 | Rogue's Passage | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Railroad is an organization dedicated to freeing synths from the influence of the Institute. Their HQ is a secret location found by following the Freedom Trail.
trans-unit.target: 铁路组织致力于解救合成人，使其免受学院影响。他们的总部位于秘密地点，但你沿着自由之路走下去就能找到。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·812 | Rootbound Crag | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rootbound Crag
trans-unit.target: 盘根峭壁

trans-unit.resname: PIP·812 | Rootbound Crag | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.\n{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控山脉或树林，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}或{G}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·812 | Rootbound Crag | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mutant strangler vines carried the town of Tanagra up into the treetops, where it remains to this day.
trans-unit.target: 变种绞杀藤将整座塔纳格拉镇都抬至树顶。全镇至今依然留在树上。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·813 | Rustvale Bridge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rustvale Bridge
trans-unit.target: 锈谷结桥

trans-unit.resname: PIP·813 | Rustvale Bridge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nIndestructible\n{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 不灭 {T}：加{R}或{W}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·813 | Rustvale Bridge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Institute . . . It's important. It really is humanity's best hope for the future, no matter what those above ground might think of us."\n—Father
trans-unit.target: 「学院…它很重要。它真的是人类未来的最大希望，不管地面上那群人怎么看待我们。」 ～父亲大人

trans-unit.resname: PIP·814 | Scattered Groves | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scattered Groves
trans-unit.target: 星散树丛

trans-unit.resname: PIP·814 | Scattered Groves | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{G}或{W}。） CARDNAME须横置进战场。 循环{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: PIP·814 | Scattered Groves | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Awaiting harvest around the Groves family cabin are plump pumpkins, hearty carrots, juicy mutfruit, and ravenous scorchbeasts.
trans-unit.target: 格罗夫斯家族小屋周围都是饱满的南瓜、丰硕的萝卜、多汁的变种果以及凶残的辐尸兽，等待有人来收获。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·815 | Scavenger Grounds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scavenger Grounds
trans-unit.target: 荒骨咒土

trans-unit.resname: PIP·815 | Scavenger Grounds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a Desert: Exile all graveyards.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {2}，{T}，牺牲一个沙漠：放逐所有坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·815 | Scavenger Grounds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The only things you need out in the wastes are food, water, and bullets. Everything else is details.
trans-unit.target: 在废土，你真正需要的东西只有食物、淡水和子弹。其他的都不重要。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·816 | Shadowblood Ridge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shadowblood Ridge
trans-unit.target: 暗血山脊

trans-unit.resname: PIP·816 | Shadowblood Ridge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PIP·816 | Shadowblood Ridge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If anyone is reading this, this place isn't safe anymore."\n—Hunter's warning note
trans-unit.target: 「如果有人看到这段话，就代表这个地方不安全了。」 ～猎人的警告笔记

trans-unit.resname: PIP·817 | Sheltered Thicket | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sheltered Thicket
trans-unit.target: 岩壁灌丛

trans-unit.resname: PIP·817 | Sheltered Thicket | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nCycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{R}或{G}。） CARDNAME须横置进战场。 循环{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）

trans-unit.resname: PIP·817 | Sheltered Thicket | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This is a great spot . . . . Traders run close enough for easy pickins, but not so close that we end up skinned."\n—Sully's Log
trans-unit.target: 「这个地点很棒…商人的路线距离够近，可以轻易下手，又不会害我们反过来被剥皮。」 ～苏利的日记

trans-unit.resname: PIP·818 | Silverbluff Bridge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Silverbluff Bridge
trans-unit.target: 银崖结桥

trans-unit.resname: PIP·818 | Silverbluff Bridge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nIndestructible\n{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 不灭 {T}：加{U}或{R}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·818 | Silverbluff Bridge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A good way to avoid getting your feet wet (and irradiated) as long as you're willing to contend with raiders, scavengers, and super mutants.
trans-unit.target: 只要你愿意跟掠夺者，拾荒人和超级变种人争地盘，这也不失是个防止双脚潮湿（且免遭辐射）的好方法。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·819 | Skycloud Expanse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skycloud Expanse
trans-unit.target: 天云旷野

trans-unit.resname: PIP·819 | Skycloud Expanse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PIP·819 | Skycloud Expanse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Brotherhood of Steel turned the airport into a mighty stronghold that staged both the *Prydwen* and Liberty Prime.
trans-unit.target: 钢铁兄弟会将机场改造成了一个能够安放普利德温号和自由至尊的巨大要塞。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·820 | Smoldering Marsh | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Smoldering Marsh
trans-unit.target: 闷燃沼地

trans-unit.resname: PIP·820 | Smoldering Marsh | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{B}或{R}。） 除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·820 | Smoldering Marsh | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even worse, the only toilet paper was locked in a nearby safe.
trans-unit.target: 更倒霉的是，唯一一卷厕纸锁在了附近的保险箱里。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·821 | Spire of Industry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spire of Industry
trans-unit.target: 工业尖塔

trans-unit.resname: PIP·821 | Spire of Industry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}，支付1点生命：加一点任意颜色的法术力。只能于你操控神器时起动。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·821 | Spire of Industry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Atop the tallest tower in the Commonwealth resides Fist, the leader of the super mutants, and his prized prisoners: Strong and Rex.
trans-unit.target: 超级变种人的首领爆拳就在联邦最高的塔顶上。那里还关着两位重要囚犯：壮壮和雷克斯。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·822 | Sulfur Falls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sulfur Falls
trans-unit.target: 硫磺瀑布

trans-unit.resname: PIP·822 | Sulfur Falls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain.\n{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控海岛或山脉，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{R}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·822 | Sulfur Falls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Shortly after the vault dwellers moved out, fire geckos moved in.
trans-unit.target: 避难所居民搬出去后不久，火蜥蜴就住了进来。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·823 | Sungrass Prairie | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sungrass Prairie
trans-unit.target: 曦草沃原

trans-unit.resname: PIP·823 | Sungrass Prairie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PIP·823 | Sungrass Prairie | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes, just for a moment, the wind is moving gently through the trees, the brahmin are grazing beneath a blue sky, and everything is at peace.
trans-unit.target: 有时，可能只有短短一瞬，你会感到清风拂过树枝，婆罗门悠闲地在蓝天下吃草，世间一切太平。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·824 | Sunken Hollow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunken Hollow
trans-unit.target: 沉落幽谷

trans-unit.resname: PIP·824 | Sunken Hollow | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
trans-unit.target: （{T}：加{U}或{B}。） 除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·824 | Sunken Hollow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Stranded far from home, the *FMS Northern Star* is a rusting hulk crewed by ghouls.
trans-unit.target: FMS北方之星号是一艘由尸鬼掌舵的生锈巨船，倾覆在远离家乡的岸边。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·825 | Sunpetal Grove | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunpetal Grove
trans-unit.target: 日瓣树丛

trans-unit.resname: PIP·825 | Sunpetal Grove | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.\n{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控树林或平原，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}或{W}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·825 | Sunpetal Grove | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Must have been something to see a movie on a screen that big."\n—Preston Garvey
trans-unit.target: 「用大的银幕看电影，一定很痛快。」 ～普雷斯敦·加维

trans-unit.resname: PIP·826 | Tainted Field | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tainted Field
trans-unit.target: 败坏原野

trans-unit.resname: PIP·826 | Tainted Field | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add {W} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加{W}或{B}。只能于你操控沼泽时起动。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·826 | Tainted Field | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Glowing Sea is the most highly irradiated region in the entire Commonwealth. According to local legend, it was ground zero for the high-yield nuclear blast that devastated most of the area.
trans-unit.target: 发光海是整个联邦辐射最严重的区域，当地流传这个地方就是核弹爆炸的主要中心点。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·827 | Tainted Isle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tainted Isle
trans-unit.target: 败坏岛屿

trans-unit.resname: PIP·827 | Tainted Isle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add {U} or {B}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加{U}或{B}。只能于你操控沼泽时起动。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·827 | Tainted Isle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The island's signal tower protected it from mirelurks but did nothing against the raiders.
trans-unit.target: 岛上的信号塔虽然防止泥沼蟹靠近，但防不住掠夺者。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·828 | Tainted Peak | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tainted Peak
trans-unit.target: 败坏山峰

trans-unit.resname: PIP·828 | Tainted Peak | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加{B}或{R}。只能于你操控沼泽时起动。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·828 | Tainted Peak | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Rockhound excavator was powered by four nuclear reactors and proved to be ... too efficient. Its mining efforts devastated the area and transformed the land into the Ash Heap.
trans-unit.target: 岩犬采石机配备了四个核反应堆，事实证明…这样过于高效。它的开采方式会毁灭所在区域，将整片地方化作灰堆。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·829 | Tainted Wood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tainted Wood
trans-unit.target: 败坏林地

trans-unit.resname: PIP·829 | Tainted Wood | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: Add {B} or {G}. Activate only if you control a Swamp.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}：加{B}或{G}。只能于你操控沼泽时起动。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·829 | Tainted Wood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Wasteland survival tip: deathclaws can't swim.
trans-unit.target: 废土求生小诀窍：死亡爪不会游泳。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·830 | Temple of Abandon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Abandon
trans-unit.target: 离弃殿堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·830 | Temple of Abandon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.\n{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。 {T}：加{R}或{G}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·830 | Temple of Abandon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You can't just travel through without stopping to see Dinky and the world's second-largest thermometer.
trans-unit.target: 你来到这里，就绝对不能错过丁基和世界上第二大的温度计。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·831 | Temple of Deceit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Deceit
trans-unit.target: 诡诈殿堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·831 | Temple of Deceit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.\n{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。 {T}：加{U}或{B}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·831 | Temple of Deceit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Vault-Tec's vaults, rather than being the savior of humanity, were actually a series of unethical psychological experiments.
trans-unit.target: 避难所科技公司的避难所表面上像是保留人类火种的救难屋，实际上却是一系列不道德心理实验的实验场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·832 | Temple of Enlightenment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Enlightenment
trans-unit.target: 启蒙殿堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·832 | Temple of Enlightenment | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。 {T}：加{W}或{U}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·832 | Temple of Enlightenment | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once, a symbol of national pride. Now, used only for target practice.
trans-unit.target: 过去曾是国家荣耀象征。如今沦为众人射击靶场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·833 | Temple of Epiphany | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Epiphany
trans-unit.target: 顿悟殿堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·833 | Temple of Epiphany | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.\n{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。 {T}：加{U}或{R}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·833 | Temple of Epiphany | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Institute's FEV experiments failed. Only Shaun's DNA made organic synths possible.
trans-unit.target: 学院的强制进化病毒实验以失败告终。只有尚恩的DNA能将生物体合成人化作现实。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·834 | Temple of Malady | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Malady
trans-unit.target: 疫病殿堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·834 | Temple of Malady | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.\n{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。 {T}：加{B}或{G}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·834 | Temple of Malady | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The world ended, yet the ads kept rolling.
trans-unit.target: 世界已然毁灭，但广告仍在继续播放。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·835 | Temple of Malice | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Malice
trans-unit.target: 恶意殿堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·835 | Temple of Malice | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。 {T}：加{B}或{R}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·835 | Temple of Malice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Saugus Ironworks is controlled by the Forged, a raider gang who worship fire and metal.
trans-unit.target: 打铁帮帮众都是痴迷烈焰与金属的掠夺者，索格斯铁工厂如今已是他们的地盘。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·836 | Temple of Mystery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Mystery
trans-unit.target: 神秘殿堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·836 | Temple of Mystery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, scry 1.\n{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。 {T}：加{G}或{U}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·836 | Temple of Mystery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Fear the glow, not the dark.
trans-unit.target: 害怕光亮，而非黑暗。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·837 | Temple of Plenty | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Temple of Plenty
trans-unit.target: 丰足殿堂

trans-unit.resname: PIP·837 | Temple of Plenty | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.source: Sunscorched Divide
trans-unit.target: 日灼分岭

trans-unit.resname: PIP·973 | Sunscorched Divide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PIP·973 | Sunscorched Divide | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "To the Divide they came. In the Divide, they rest."\n—Ulysses
trans-unit.target: 「他们奉命来到大分水岭。他们把命留在了大分水岭。」 ～尤利西斯

trans-unit.resname: PIP·974 | Viridescent Bog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Viridescent Bog
trans-unit.target: 碧绿腐沼

trans-unit.resname: PIP·974 | Viridescent Bog | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PIP·974 | Viridescent Bog | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Master had literally built his army one mutant at a time. Humans, preferably with little radiation damage, were captured and sent to the vats.
trans-unit.target: 主教当真是一个个变种人地亲手打造这支军队。他会先物色人群，最好是找到那些几乎未受辐射伤害的个体，而后把他们抓来放入缸内。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·975 | Austere Command | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Austere Command
trans-unit.target: 严峻指命

trans-unit.resname: PIP·975 | Austere Command | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with mana value 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 选择两项～ •消灭所有神器。 •消灭所有结界。 •消灭所有法术力值等于或小于3的生物。 •消灭所有法术力值等于或大于4的生物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·976 | Captain of the Watch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Captain of the Watch
trans-unit.target: 守望队长

trans-unit.resname: PIP·976 | Captain of the Watch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)\nOther Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 由你操控的其他士兵生物得+1/+1且具有警戒异能。 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出三个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·977 | Entrapment Maneuver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Entrapment Maneuver
trans-unit.target: 诱捕计略

trans-unit.resname: PIP·977 | Entrapment Maneuver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. You create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is that creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手牺牲一个进行攻击的生物。你派出X个1/1白色士兵衍生生物，X为该生物的防御力。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·977 | Entrapment Maneuver | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every squad of deathclaw hunters had a role for the newbies: bait.
trans-unit.target: 每支死亡爪猎人小队都有留给新人的任务：当诱饵。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·978 | Hour of Reckoning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hour of Reckoning
trans-unit.target: 报应时刻

trans-unit.resname: PIP·978 | Hour of Reckoning | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)\nDestroy all nontoken creatures.
trans-unit.target: 召集 消灭所有非衍生物的生物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·978 | Hour of Reckoning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Synths are crawling all over the place! Thin them out before we drop!"\n—Proctor Ingram
trans-unit.target: 「该死的合成人在下面走来走去！降落前先消灭它们！」 ～英格兰姆督学

trans-unit.resname: PIP·979 | Keeper of the Accord | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Keeper of the Accord
trans-unit.target: 调和守卫

trans-unit.resname: PIP·979 | Keeper of the Accord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player controls more creatures than you, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.\nAt the beginning of each opponent's end step, if that player controls more lands than you, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在每位对手的结束步骤开始时，若该牌手操控的生物比你多，则你派出一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。 在每位对手的结束步骤开始时，若该牌手操控的地比你多，则你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本的平原牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·980 | Mantle of the Ancients | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mantle of the Ancients
trans-unit.target: 先贤披风

trans-unit.resname: PIP·980 | Mantle of the Ancients | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature you control\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return any number of target Aura and/or Equipment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to enchanted creature.\nEnchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each Aura and Equipment attached to it.
trans-unit.target: 结附于由你操控的生物 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择任意数量目标在你坟墓场中且能够贴附于所结附的生物之灵气和／或武具牌。将这些牌从该处移回战场并贴附于所结附的生物上。 所结附的生物上每贴附一个灵气和武具，便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·981 | Marshal's Anthem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marshal's Anthem
trans-unit.target: 元帅赞美诗

trans-unit.resname: PIP·981 | Marshal's Anthem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nCreatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return up to X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of times CARDNAME was kicked.

trans-unit.resname: PIP·982 | Martial Coup | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Martial Coup
trans-unit.target: 军事壮举

trans-unit.resname: PIP·982 | Martial Coup | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If X is 5 or more, destroy all other creatures.
trans-unit.target: 派出X个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。如果X等于或大于5，则消灭所有其他生物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·982 | Martial Coup | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Elder Nolan McNamara broke the Chain That Binds, starting the events which led to Hardin's coup.
trans-unit.target: 诺兰·麦克纳马拉长老打破了束缚之链，从而引发一系列事件，最终导致哈丁篡权夺位。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·983 | Open the Vaults | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Open the Vaults
trans-unit.target: 打开地窖

trans-unit.resname: PIP·983 | Open the Vaults | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to the battlefield under their owners' control. (Auras with nothing to enchant remain in graveyards.)
trans-unit.target: 将所有神器和结界牌在各自拥有者的操控下从所有坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·983 | Open the Vaults | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It may be time to leave, but I'll never forget the day you all entered Vault 76."\n—Overseer
trans-unit.target: 「虽然离别终将来临，但我永远不会忘记各位刚进76号避难所的那一天。」 ～监管人

trans-unit.resname: PIP·984 | Puresteel Paladin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Puresteel Paladin
trans-unit.target: 净钢神圣武士

trans-unit.resname: PIP·984 | Puresteel Paladin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an Equipment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.\nMetalcraft — Equipment you control have equip {0} as long as you control three or more artifacts.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个武具在你操控下进战场时，你可以抓一张牌。 金技～只要你操控三个或更多神器，由你操控的武具便具有佩带{0}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·984 | Puresteel Paladin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I wear the armor. I am the weapon."
trans-unit.target: 「我穿着装甲。我就是武器。」

trans-unit.resname: PIP·985 | Secure the Wastes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Secure the Wastes
trans-unit.target: 卫护荒漠

trans-unit.resname: PIP·985 | Secure the Wastes | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create X 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 派出X个1/1白色战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·985 | Secure the Wastes | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Patrolling the Mojave almost makes you wish for a nuclear winter."
trans-unit.target: 「你去莫哈维巡逻一遭，肯定就想着核子冬天还是来了的好。」

trans-unit.resname: PIP·986 | Single Combat | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Single Combat
trans-unit.target: 单挑

trans-unit.resname: PIP·986 | Single Combat | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各选择一个由其操控的生物或鹏洛客，然后牺牲其余生物和鹏洛客。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，牌手不能施放生物或鹏洛客咒语。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·986 | Single Combat | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some fight to destroy their enemies. Some fight to destroy themselves.
trans-unit.target: 有些人战斗是为了消灭敌人。有些人战斗是为了消灭自己。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·987 | Fraying Sanity | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fraying Sanity
trans-unit.target: 崩碎心智

trans-unit.resname: PIP·987 | Fraying Sanity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant player\nAt the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.
trans-unit.target: 结附于牌手 在每个结束步骤开始时，所结附的牌手磨X张牌，X为本回合中从任何区域进入其坟墓场之牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·987 | Fraying Sanity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The king! The king has been murdered! It is regicide! Vault Boy... what did you do? What did... *we* do?"
trans-unit.target: 「国王！国王被杀了！这是弑君！避难所小子…你干了什么？…我们干了什么？」

trans-unit.resname: PIP·988 | Inexorable Tide | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inexorable Tide
trans-unit.target: 难阻浪潮

trans-unit.resname: PIP·988 | Inexorable Tide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放咒语时，增殖。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·988 | Inexorable Tide | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Radiation is an invisible tide that seeps into the bones of the land, changing it irrevocably.
trans-unit.target: 辐射这股无形浪潮已然深入大地骨髓，不可逆转地改变了地表上的一切。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·989 | Mechanized Production | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mechanized Production
trans-unit.target: 机械化生产

trans-unit.resname: PIP·989 | Mechanized Production | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant artifact you control\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted artifact. Then if you control eight or more artifacts with the same name as one another, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: 结附于由你操控的神器 在你的维持开始时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为所结附的神器之复制品。然后如果你操控八个或更多彼此同名的神器，则你赢得这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·989 | Mechanized Production | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At the onset of the Great War, Nuka-Cola's best minds were reassigned to weapons development.
trans-unit.target: 在大战之初，核子可乐最顶尖的人员全被改派到开发武器的岗位上。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·990 | One with the Machine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: One with the Machine
trans-unit.target: 机械融合

trans-unit.resname: PIP·990 | One with the Machine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw cards equal to the highest mana value among artifacts you control.
trans-unit.target: 抓若干牌，其数量等同于由你操控之神器中的最大法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·990 | One with the Machine | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Synth-kind welcomes you, as long as you welcome us."
trans-unit.target: 「合成人不会排斥你，只要你不排斥我们。」

trans-unit.resname: PIP·991 | Black Market | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Black Market
trans-unit.target: 黑市

trans-unit.resname: PIP·991 | Black Market | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\nAt the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} for each charge counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 在你战斗前的行动阶段开始时，CARDNAME上每有一个充电指示物，便加{B}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·991 | Black Market | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There's very little that merchants won't buy—and even less that wastelanders won't sell.
trans-unit.target: 商人几乎没有东西不买～甚至比废土人不卖的东西还少。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·992 | Lethal Scheme | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lethal Scheme
trans-unit.target: 夺命阴谋

trans-unit.resname: PIP·992 | Lethal Scheme | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)\nDestroy target creature or planeswalker. Each creature that convoked CARDNAME connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)
trans-unit.target: 召集 消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。令每个召集CARDNAME的生物筹谋。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·993 | Blasphemous Act | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Blasphemous Act
trans-unit.target: 渎神行径

trans-unit.resname: PIP·993 | Blasphemous Act | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.\nCARDNAME deals 13 damage to each creature.
trans-unit.target: 战场上每有一个生物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。 CARDNAME对每个生物各造成13点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·993 | Blasphemous Act | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Everyone knew the bombs were coming. Everyone but the public.
trans-unit.target: 大家都知道炸弹要来了。但这大家不包括大众。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·994 | Chaos Warp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chaos Warp
trans-unit.target: 混沌歪曲

trans-unit.resname: PIP·994 | Chaos Warp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标永久物。其拥有者将它洗入其牌库，然后展示其牌库顶牌。如果该牌是永久物牌，则该牌手将它放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·994 | Chaos Warp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: No one knew what the Zetans wanted. But whatever it was, it involved cattle.
trans-unit.target: 没人知道Z星人想要什么。但不管是什么，总之都跟牛有关系。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·995 | Stolen Strategy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Stolen Strategy
trans-unit.target: 战术遭窃

trans-unit.resname: PIP·995 | Stolen Strategy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，放逐每位对手的牌库顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以从所放逐的牌之中施放咒语，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来施放这些咒语。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·995 | Stolen Strategy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hacking is just good science!"
trans-unit.target: 「破解也是好科学！」

trans-unit.resname: PIP·996 | Branching Evolution | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Branching Evolution
trans-unit.target: 分枝演化

trans-unit.resname: PIP·996 | Branching Evolution | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, twice that many +1/+1 counters are put on that creature instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在某个由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在该生物上放置该数量两倍的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·996 | Branching Evolution | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Master discovered a new evolutionary path after tossing a human, a dog, and a cat into a vat of Forced Evolutionary Virus. He called his creations "centaurs" and unleashed them unto the wastes.
trans-unit.target: 主教将一个人、一只狗、一只猫扔入强制进化病毒缸内，发现了一条全新的进化途径。他将自己造物称为「多脚兽」，并把它们全放生到了废土当中。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·997 | Guardian Project | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Guardian Project
trans-unit.target: 卫护计划

trans-unit.resname: PIP·997 | Guardian Project | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, if it doesn't have the same name as another creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在你操控下进战场时，若它与由你操控的其他生物和你坟墓场中的生物牌都不同名，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·997 | Guardian Project | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They will give me the army I need to bring peace to the entire wasteland."\n—The Master
trans-unit.target: 「我需要军队才能为废土带来和平，而他们能实现我的梦想。」 ～主教

trans-unit.resname: PIP·998 | Hardened Scales | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hardened Scales
trans-unit.target: 坚固鳞甲

trans-unit.resname: PIP·998 | Hardened Scales | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将在某个由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个+1/+1指示物，则改为在其上放置该数量加一的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·998 | Hardened Scales | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The wastes will toughen anybody up— even those who were already tough to begin with.
trans-unit.target: 废土能让所有人更强健～包括那些原本就很强健的人。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·999 | Heroic Intervention | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Heroic Intervention
trans-unit.target: 英勇干预

trans-unit.resname: PIP·999 | Heroic Intervention | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的永久物获得辟邪与不灭异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·999 | Heroic Intervention | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Another beautiful day in the most dangerous place in the world."\n—Nick Valentine
trans-unit.target: 「又是新的一天，还是待在世界上最危险的地方。」 ～尼克·瓦伦坦

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1000 | Tireless Tracker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tireless Tracker
trans-unit.target: 不倦追迹人

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1000 | Tireless Tracker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")\nWhenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你操控下进战场时，探查。 每当你牺牲一个线索时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1001 | Anguished Unmaking | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anguished Unmaking
trans-unit.target: 哀恸归虚

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1001 | Anguished Unmaking | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target nonland permanent. You lose 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标非地永久物。你失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1001 | Anguished Unmaking | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: James flooded the room with radiation, ensuring Project Purity would not fall into Enclave hands. With his last breath, he told his child to run.
trans-unit.target: 詹姆斯令辐射布满房间，确保净水计划不会落入英克雷手中。在生命垂危之际，他用尽最后力气催促自己的孩子快跑。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1002 | Assemble the Legion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Assemble the Legion
trans-unit.target: 召集战团

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1002 | Assemble the Legion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on CARDNAME. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置一个召集指示物。然后CARDNAME上每有一个召集指示物，便派出一个1/1，红白双色，具敏捷异能的士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1003 | Biomass Mutation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Biomass Mutation
trans-unit.target: 巨量突变

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1003 | Biomass Mutation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物之基础力量与防御力为X/X直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1003 | Biomass Mutation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Vault 87's Evolutionary Experimentation Program exposed subjects to an airborne version of FEV. Rapid physical enhancements accompanied sharp mental regression, and the oldest mutants would become almost feral.
trans-unit.target: 87号避难所的进化实验计划，是让实验对象接触能通过空气传播的FEV病毒。结果他们体能快速增强，心智极度萎缩，就连最年长的变种人也变得无比凶残。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1004 | Casualties of War | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Casualties of War
trans-unit.target: 战争伤亡

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1004 | Casualties of War | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose one or more —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target land.
• Destroy target planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项或多项～ •消灭目标神器。 •消灭目标生物。 •消灭目标结界。 •消灭目标地。 •消灭目标鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1004 | Casualties of War | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: War... war never changes.
trans-unit.target: 战争…战争永远不变。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1005 | Fervent Charge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fervent Charge
trans-unit.target: 激昂冲锋

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1005 | Fervent Charge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物攻击时，它得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1005 | Fervent Charge | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: NCR's rangers were feared far and wide. Even Caesar's Legion respected them in single combat.
trans-unit.target: 新加州共和国游骑兵人见人怕。就连凯撒军团的人短兵相接时都敬畏三分。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1006 | Ruinous Ultimatum | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ruinous Ultimatum
trans-unit.target: 毁坏通牒

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1006 | Ruinous Ultimatum | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all nonland permanents your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有由对手操控的非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1006 | Ruinous Ultimatum | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It was my responsibility to bring the torch of knowledge to the wastes."\n—Caesar
trans-unit.target: 「令知识之火燃遍废土是我的职责。」 ～凯撒

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1007 | Wake the Past | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wake the Past
trans-unit.target: 唤醒过往

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1007 | Wake the Past | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all artifact cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. They gain haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 将所有神器牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它们获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1007 | Wake the Past | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Everyone thought RobCo's Assaultron reserves were decimated in the Great War. In reality, they were merely dormant.
trans-unit.target: 所有人都以为罗科后备的突袭者机器人在大战中已被尽数摧毁。实际上，它们不过一直都在休眠。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1008 | Basilisk Collar | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Basilisk Collar
trans-unit.target: 蜥怪颈环

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1008 | Basilisk Collar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.\nEquip {2}
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有死触与系命异能。 佩带{2}

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1008 | Basilisk Collar | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A mark of companionship, not subservience.
trans-unit.target: 这颈环代表着同伴情谊，而非主仆之别。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1009 | Bloodforged Battle-Axe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bloodforged Battle-Axe
trans-unit.target: 淬血战斧

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1009 | Bloodforged Battle-Axe | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+0.\nWhenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of CARDNAME.\nEquip {2}

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1009 | Bloodforged Battle-Axe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: With just his trusty axe, Grognak became king.
trans-unit.target: 单凭一把可靠的斧子，古古那就此成了王。

trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一武具的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1011 | Masterwork of Ingenuity | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's not a perfect replica, but your skull won't know the difference."
trans-unit.target: 「虽然不是完美的复制品，但你的脑袋也分不出来。」

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1012 | Mystic Forge | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.\nYou may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library.\n{T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.
trans-unit.target: 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以从你的牌库顶施放神器咒语和无色咒语。 {T}，支付1点生命：放逐你的牌库顶牌。

trans-unit.source: Panharmonicon
trans-unit.target: 万和琴

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1013 | Panharmonicon | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 如果某个由你操控之永久物的触发式异能因神器或生物进战场而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1013 | Panharmonicon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The difference between surviving and living is joy.
trans-unit.target: 生存与生活的区别，就在于能否苦中作乐。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1014 | Solemn Simulacrum | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 黯色幻影

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1014 | Solemn Simulacrum | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.\nWhen CARDNAME dies, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 「欢迎，管理员。瞄准设定已删除，并设定为ADMIN_USER_GROUP:: <Token.Name=Faction>。」

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 循环{2}

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1036 | Sheltered Thicket | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This is a great spot . . . . Traders run close enough for easy pickins, but not so close that we end up skinned."\n—Sully's Log
trans-unit.target: 「这个地点很棒…商人的路线距离够近，可以轻易下手，又不会害我们反过来被剥皮。」 ～苏利的日记

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1037 | Skycloud Expanse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Skycloud Expanse
trans-unit.target: 天云旷野

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1037 | Skycloud Expanse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PIP·1037 | Skycloud Expanse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Brotherhood of Steel turned the airport into a mighty stronghold that staged both the *Prydwen* and Liberty Prime.
trans-unit.target: 钢铁兄弟会将机场改造成了一个能够安放普利德温号和自由至尊的巨大要塞。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1038 | Smoldering Marsh | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Smoldering Marsh
trans-unit.target: 闷燃沼地

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1038 | Smoldering Marsh | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: ({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1038 | Smoldering Marsh | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even worse, the only toilet paper was locked in a nearby safe.
trans-unit.target: 更倒霉的是，唯一一卷厕纸锁在了附近的保险箱里。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1039 | Spire of Industry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Spire of Industry
trans-unit.target: 工业尖塔

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1039 | Spire of Industry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control an artifact.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {T}，支付1点生命：加一点任意颜色的法术力。只能于你操控神器时起动。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1039 | Spire of Industry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Atop the tallest tower in the Commonwealth resides Fist, the leader of the super mutants, and his prized prisoners: Strong and Rex.
trans-unit.target: 超级变种人的首领爆拳就在联邦最高的塔顶上。那里还关着两位重要囚犯：壮壮和雷克斯。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1040 | Sulfur Falls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sulfur Falls
trans-unit.target: 硫磺瀑布

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1040 | Sulfur Falls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain.\n{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控海岛或山脉，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{R}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1040 | Sulfur Falls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Shortly after the vault dwellers moved out, fire geckos moved in.
trans-unit.target: 避难所居民搬出去后不久，火蜥蜴就住了进来。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1041 | Sungrass Prairie | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sungrass Prairie
trans-unit.target: 曦草沃原

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1041 | Sungrass Prairie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PIP·1041 | Sungrass Prairie | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes, just for a moment, the wind is moving gently through the trees, the brahmin are grazing beneath a blue sky, and everything is at peace.
trans-unit.target: 有时，可能只有短短一瞬，你会感到清风拂过树枝，婆罗门悠闲地在蓝天下吃草，世间一切太平。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1042 | Sunken Hollow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunken Hollow
trans-unit.target: 沉落幽谷

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1042 | Sunken Hollow | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 除非你操控两个或更多基本地，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1042 | Sunken Hollow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Stranded far from home, the *FMS Northern Star* is a rusting hulk crewed by ghouls.
trans-unit.target: FMS北方之星号是一艘由尸鬼掌舵的生锈巨船，倾覆在远离家乡的岸边。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1043 | Sunpetal Grove | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sunpetal Grove
trans-unit.target: 日瓣树丛

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1043 | Sunpetal Grove | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 除非你操控树林或平原，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}或{W}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1043 | Sunpetal Grove | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Must have been something to see a movie on a screen that big."\n—Preston Garvey
trans-unit.target: 「用大的银幕看电影，一定很痛快。」 ～普雷斯敦·加维

trans-unit.target: 你来到这里，就绝对不能错过丁基和世界上第二大的温度计。

trans-unit.target: 诡诈殿堂

trans-unit.source: Vault-Tec's vaults, rather than being the savior of humanity, were actually a series of unethical psychological experiments.
trans-unit.target: 避难所科技公司的避难所表面上像是保留人类火种的救难屋，实际上却是一系列不道德心理实验的实验场。

trans-unit.target: 启蒙殿堂

trans-unit.target: 过去曾是国家荣耀象征。如今沦为众人射击靶场。

trans-unit.target: 顿悟殿堂

trans-unit.target: 学院的强制进化病毒实验以失败告终。只有尚恩的DNA能将生物体合成人化作现实。

trans-unit.target: 打铁帮帮众都是痴迷烈焰与金属的掠夺者，索格斯铁工厂如今已是他们的地盘。

trans-unit.target: 「我们以梦想维系亲情，依探索求知苍穹，共建涤净心灵之归宿。」 ～杰克逊

trans-unit.target: 胜利殿堂

trans-unit.target: 宝窖

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1054 | Treasure Vault | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {X}{X}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：派出X个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1054 | Treasure Vault | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The vault of the Sierra Madre Hotel & Casino contains a fortune in gold . . . and a tragic tale.
trans-unit.target: 马德雷山脉赌场度假村地宝库内有数不尽的黄金…和一则悲惨故事。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1055 | Windbrisk Heights | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Windbrisk Heights
trans-unit.target: 迅风高地

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1055 | Windbrisk Heights | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Hideaway 4 (When this land enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{W}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if you attacked with three or more creatures this turn.
trans-unit.target: 掩蔽4 CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}。 {W}，{T}：如果你本回合中曾以三个或更多生物攻击，则你可以使用所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1056 | Woodland Cemetery | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Woodland Cemetery
trans-unit.target: 林地墓园

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1056 | Woodland Cemetery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest.\n{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控沼泽或树林，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}或{G}。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1056 | Woodland Cemetery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There are more dead here than the gravestones suggest.
trans-unit.target: 葬于此处的死者，比现今留下的墓碑更多。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1068 | War Room | Card Name
trans-unit.source: War Room
trans-unit.target: 战情室

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1068 | War Room | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{3}, {T}, Pay life equal to the number of colors in your commanders' color identity: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {3}，{T}，支付等同于你指挥官标识色中颜色数量的生命：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: PIP·1068 | War Room | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A speech to stir the Brothers of Steel, a speech to bring the Enclave to heel, a speech to rouse a robotic ideal.
trans-unit.target: 慷慨演讲，令钢铁兄弟会群情激昂，使英克雷思念情长，让机器共存理念传扬四方。
